Articles.Content:
Inspired by the old thread "Where is your Jeb?", Here's a little thing so people can know where you put your main four kerbonauts at the moment.

--

My original three are chillin' at the astronaut complex after a 23-day Apollo-style that went wrong, while Valentina is on a one-way trip to Duna.

Jeb, bill, bob and other random kerbonauts babysitting a science outpost on minimus.

Meanwhile Val and 2 other kerbals are figuring out mining on the mÃƒÂ¼n.

Both dont have parachutes on their respective crafts so they aren't coming home until i send a rescue craft, which im too lazy to do for the moment.

Jeb, Bill, and Bob are in an (successful) Apollo Command Module with the LM attached, I wanted to bring it with me. Then I launched an ion probe to Jool before taking them out. So they're probably eighty by now. Still there.

Mine shared every mission they ever flew (Which was interesting when I only had the 1 man pods in career). After clearing out the science on Minimus... Jeb, Bob, & Bill retired, for now, with 2 stars to my orbital training academy (mod) to train new astronauts. Val is hanging out in the orbital training academy teasing Jeb over getting picked as the pilot for the upcoming Duna mission ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

Jeb: Sitting in space station in LKO

Bill: Driving a fuel tanker that transports fuel form Minmus refinery to LKO

Bob: In charge of a giant orbital spaceship hangar

Val: Stowed away on a launch without permission... Has not returned since.
Jeb and one other of the three are on a Mun Station. The other one of the original three is now at the KSC. Val is dead...
Bob is at home. The others are stuck on two failed return vessels at Duna.

I killed Val on the pad on purpose, since I am a sexist.

> 
> I'm kidding! :-)

Val and five others are at Mun Orbital Command doing science; six more are in Starbridge Station in low Kerbin orbit waiting for the Orbital Skiff to carry them to Minmus Orbital Command where they will do science. Jeb, Bill, and Bob have been "kicked upstairs" to desk jobs at the Astronaut Complex--at this time the space program is only accepting female applicants, because there must be balance.

Jeb is off somewhere doing something... I forgot. I think he's stranded on a transfer orbit from Minmus as part of the Kerbin "Grand Tour" mission awaiting a fuel top-off.

Bill is on his way to Minmus in a much more well-fueled ship as part of my first Minmus landing mission for 1.0.

Val and Bob are at KSC waiting for something to do xD

Val is in charge of my Ike mining and launch facility. Bill and Bob are sitting on a space station in LKO and I've been too lazy to go get them.. it's been like 30 years. Jeb's at my Minmus mining and launch facility.
In my current sandbox Jab and Bill are in Kerbstation Alpha in LKO and Bob and Val are in the Minmus Refueling Station, awaiting landers to go to the surface.
my Kosmonauts are at KSC... testing stuff for future Eve missions...

Jeb = Likely dead. Game crashed horribly on a 'spaceplane' crash on the runway.

The other 3. Astronaut complex waiting just like the other 97 for their next demise.

Jebidiah spent a few weeks orbiting the Mun after my first Mun landing came up short on fuel to finish a return and was picked up later by Cargy Kerman, who was herself rescued from her wrecked craft (rescue contract) by a probe ship designed to recover her from Kerbin orbit, and Nephe from a Mun range orbit. All three Kerbals were safely returned to Kerbin. (All one trip)

Jeb and Bob are now MIA. Not really sure why.

All six of my Kerman rescues so far have been female. These girls need to learn how to drive, lol.
Jeb died in a flipping capsule incident, the rest are in KSC waiting for new missions.
One is dead, other stuck in solar orbit, third stuck EVA on LKO, the last one in a Mun "base".
